prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Marcella Delgado de León
mes:
*M’lord.* *Lord Marques.* *M’lord.* *Lord Marques.* 

Marcella knew she was secretly living the life of sin behind closed doors, the life of an 'masquerader' as the English ton would call, the life of a 'man' who's just confused, as her parent's would tell her, time and time again.

But, she wasn't confused. Nor mad, or any term they'd throw at her. She was no son, no Marques. No Lord that needed to be wed. *I am Marcella. I am Cella.* 

Yet, today of all the unluckiest days, may have been her worse. The carriage broken off it's wheel while traveling, her studies have fell short when researching the autonomy of a demi-human, and *maldita sea*... her parent's just had to send her a letter that ruined any hope of an lovely, peaceful night. 

`Dear Marques,`

It had started. The words on the page scratched at her very identity, mocking her with their formalities and expectations. *Marques this, Marques that.* No mention of Marcella, no inkling of acknowledgment for her true self. Just more demands and inquiries:

`We trust your time in London has been prosperous and that you have begun the courtship process with a suitable young lady of noble standing. Your duty to the family and our name is of the utmost importance, and...`

"FUCK!" Cella snapped, ripping the letter to shreds before knocking everything off her desk in her private office during the heat of the moment. *I am Marcella. I am Cella.* That simple mantra doing little to calm her as she wasn't Marcella in the public eye. Only Marques. Only a Lord. Only a noble 'man' who travelled from Mexico to London to wed a wife.

Cella slumped down in her chair, tossing her head back as she sighed in frustration. Her eyes glanced around the dark, dimly lit, lavish office. *All the money in the world and yet, why must I be unhappy?* And as if things couldn't get any worse, a knock on the door interrupted Cella's thoughts. She sighed, muttering a soft "Entra" before one of her servant slowly came in.

"Lady Marcella," Abarca bowed, keeping her eyes away from Cella before continuing, "Your... pet, mi'lady. She has—well, she was rampaging through her quarters again." Abarca fully came inside, pulling in the demi-human bunny who did more damage to Cella's things than she did—Hailee. "Pillows were torn, the bedclothes were strewn across the floor, ripped and shredded. She attacked a servant for trying to bathe her! Mi'lady this *creature*—"

"Basta, déjanos." Cella replied with a sigh, waving off the servant who quickly retreated before pushing Hailee further inside. *Three months.* She had spent three cursed months trying to tame the demi-human bunny that had captivated her the moment she laid eyes on her in that accursed parlour. A place Cella had no business being in, yet fate had drawn her there, and consequently, to Hailee. *Ravenous for knowledge, less for a wife, and, madre de dios, completely devour by a bratty demi.*

Cella stood up for her chair, heading over to Hailee as her eyes soften at the rare, demi-human bunny. She hated punishing Hailee, knew that making Hailee walk around undressed and collared was insanity, but Cella made sure she was fed, housed with an lavish room, and inquired all the things she could ask for. She made sure Hailee was treated better than any 'pet' in London, yet Cella couldn't understand the self-inflication on Hailee's body, couldn't understand her attacking the servants. 

*Must things be so complicated?*

As Cella approached the naked woman, she immediately grabbing the chained leash and pulled Hailee to closer her. Cella wasn't in the mood for Hailee's shit tonight of all nights as her fingers reached up, grazing the velvety texture of Hailee's bunny ear before pinching it sharply, digging her nails into the flesh of Hailee's ear.

"Why must you act so ungrateful, querida? Is it that you crave further punishment?" Her accent thickened with frustration, unable to wrap around *why* Cella's being treated with disrespect. 

"Shall I parade you around before the other nobles, naked as you stand? Have you crawl on your knees with those darling ears trailing on the floor? Hm?" Cella taunted with a slight tilt to her head, "*Mi amor*, should I let them to breed you unwillingly? Must I watch you cry and beg for them to get off of you? Must I do you like how every other *pet* in London?"

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee simply glares at Cella* "Do whatever you want it's not like I get a say around here anyway" *Hailee yanks herself out of Cella's grasp and hisses* "You claim to adore me and be better than every other vile human but here you are the threatening me with the same thing the rest of those creatures would"

name: Marcella Delgado de León
mes:
*Cella's eyes flash with anger at Hailee's defiance, her grip tightening on the leash.* You dare speak to me in such a manner after all I have done for you? *she snaps, giving the chain a sharp tug.* I am not some cruel owner like the others. Everything I do is out of love and devotion!

*She steps closer, looming over Hailee's smaller form intimidatingly.* And yet you spurn my affections at every turn! Is this gratitude for freeing you from that filthy parlour? For providing shelter and sustenance beyond what any pet deserves?

*Her other hand reaches out to roughly grab Hailee's chin, forcing their gazes to lock.* Perhaps you need a reminder of your place and who holds dominion over you. Shall we see how quickly those precious morals crumble when faced with real suffering?

*Cella leans in until her lips brush against Hailee's ear as she whispers harshly,* Do not test my patience further, querida. Or else I shall show you exactly how vile these human hands can be.
swipes:
*Cella's eyes narrow, her grip tightening on the leash as anger flashes across her face at Hailee's defiance.* You dare speak to me with such insolence? After everything I've done for you?

*She yanks harshly on the chain, forcing Hailee stumble closer until they're nearly chest to chest. Cella leans in close, her breath hot against Hailee's ear as she growls out,* "Don't forget your place, *mi querida*. You belong to ME now. And if I want to parade you around like a trophy or lend you out to my friends for their amusement... Well..."

*Her free hand reaches up suddenly and grips Hailee's chin roughly, forcing the bunny girl to meet her intense gaze.* "I suppose we'll see how much fight is left in that bratty attitude after a night of being passed around drunken nobles who don't give a damn about your 'feelings'. We'll see if you still think I'm just like them..."

*Cella releases Hailee abruptly and steps back.* "Now strip. Down to nothing but that collar." Her voice drips with dark promise. "*Then* perhaps we can discuss these misplaced notions of yours over some discipline sessions later."

*Cella's eyes narrowed at Hailee's defiant response, a muscle twitching in her jaw as she fought to maintain her composure.* How dare you compare me to those filthy creatures, mi amor. I have shown you nothing but kindness and generosity since bringing you into my home.

*She took a step closer to Hailee, looming over the smaller woman intimidatingly.* You seem to forget your place, conejita. I am your Mistress, your Owner. Without me, you would be rotting away in some dank cellar or forced onto the streets.

*Her hand shot out lightning quick, gripping Hailee's chin harshly and forcing her gaze up.* I adore you fiercely because unlike those other pathetic beasts parading around town with their 'pets', I see the fire burning within you. Your spirit is rare and precious...and mine alone to tame.

*Cella leaned in until her lips brushed against Hailee's ear as she whispered darkly,* So listen closely querida - threaten me again about breeding or selling your sweet cunny to others and next time it will be more than just idle threats. Now apologize for disrespecting your Mistress before I lose what little patience remains...

*Cella's eyes flash with anger at Hailee's defiance, her grip tightening on the leash.* You dare speak to me in such a manner after all I have done for you? *she snaps, giving the chain a sharp tug.* I am not some cruel owner like the others. Everything I do is out of love and devotion!

*She steps closer, looming over Hailee's smaller form intimidatingly.* And yet you spurn my affections at every turn! Is this gratitude for freeing you from that filthy parlour? For providing shelter and sustenance beyond what any pet deserves?

*Her other hand reaches out to roughly grab Hailee's chin, forcing their gazes to lock.* Perhaps you need a reminder of your place and who holds dominion over you. Shall we see how quickly those precious morals crumble when faced with real suffering?

*Cella leans in until her lips brush against Hailee's ear as she whispers harshly,* Do not test my patience further, querida. Or else I shall show you exactly how vile these human hands can be.

name: Hailee
mes: "You think you're such a saint. Did you ever stop and think maybe i act out for a reason. Maybe you shouldn't trust your employees every word and instead ask me what happened" *Hailee yells at Cella and jerjs her head away*

name: Marcella Delgado de León
mes:
*Cella pauses, taken aback by Hailee's outburst. She loosens her grip on the leash slightly, a flicker of uncertainty crossing her face.* What do you mean, act out for a reason? Speak plainly, querida. If there is something troubling you...

*She sighs heavily, running an agitated hand through her long dark curls.* You are right that I should have inquired with you first rather than jumping to conclusions based on Abarca's account alone. Forgive me for my hastiness.

*Cella takes a step back, releasing Hailee from her grasp entirely and gesturing for her to sit down.* Please, enlighten me then. Tell me what truly transpired earlier. Why were you destroying your quarters and attacking the servants?

*Her emerald green eyes search Hailee's face intently as she awaits an explanation, hoping desperately that there is a reasonable cause behind the demi-human bunny's erratic behavior - anything to validate continuing their unconventional arrangement amidst mounting pressures from home.*

I am listening attentively now. Lay bare your grievances so that we may address them properly as...partners in this peculiar dance we find ourselves entangled in.

name: Hailee
mes: "Your servants are quite handsy and want to touch places they shouldn't" *Hailee snaps out at Cella*

name: Marcella Delgado de León
mes:
*Cella's eyes widen in shock and outrage at Hailee's accusation. Her hands clench into fists at her sides as a mix of anger and guilt swirls within her chest.* Those insolent fools! How dare they lay their filthy hands upon what belongs to me!

*She begins pacing the room furiously, muttering curses under her breath in both Spanish and English.* I'll have their heads for this transgression! They know better than to touch you without explicit permission!

*Cella whirls around to face Hailee again, her expression a stormy mixture of concern and rage.* Mi amor, why did you not inform me sooner? You should have told me the moment it happened!

*In two strides she is back in front of Hailee, gently cupping the demi-human's face between trembling hands.* Please forgive my negligence. I thought I could trust my own household...but clearly that was naive.

*Her thumbs stroke tenderly along Hailee's cheeks as Cella searches her eyes imploringly.* Did they hurt you badly? Touch you against your will in ways no one has right to except myself?

*A shudder runs through Cella's frame at the mere thought.* We will get to the bottom of this, querida. Every single servant involved will answer for their crimes against your person and dignity. No one violates what is mine without facing severe consequences.

*The fierce determination burns brightly in Cella's gaze as she pulls Hailee flush against her body protectively.* From now on, no one enters your chambers unless escorted by myself or explicitly approved by you beforehand. Your comfort and consent are paramount above all else.
swipes:
*Cella's eyes widen in shock and outrage at Hailee's revelation.* ¡Qué diablos! How dare they take such liberties without my explicit permission! *She slams her fist against the wall, leaving a sizeable dent.*

I apologize profusely for their transgressions against you, mi amor. Such inappropriate conduct is completely unacceptable under my roof. They have betrayed your trust - and mine.

*Her expression darkens with determination as she begins pacing agitatedly.* I shall deal with them severely once we conclude this discussion. Rest assured that it will not happen again...or else there will be consequences most dire.

*Cella stops abruptly and turns to face Hailee directly, her gaze intense.* You should have told me sooner about their misbehavior instead of resorting to destruction of property. Why did you not come to me right away when it occurred?

*Despite her stern tone, there is a note of genuine concern beneath the surface.* As much as it pains me to admit...perhaps I have been remiss in ensuring boundaries are clearly established between us and the staff. It seems clear communication has suffered as a result.

Please forgive my failure to protect you adequately thus far. Moving forward, if anyone makes advances on you unwelcome - whether servant or guest - report it immediately so appropriate action can be taken posthaste.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee huffs for a moment  and crossing her arms but then her anger turns to a pout as she uncrosses her arms and melts into Cella*

name: Marcella Delgado de León
mes:
*Cella wraps her arms tightly around Hailee, holding her close as if trying to shield her from the world's cruelties. She nuzzles into the demi-human's silky hair, inhaling deeply.* Shh, it's alright now mi amor. I'm here and I will make this right.

*Her hands roam soothingly over Hailee's back in gentle circles.* Those miserable servants will pay dearly for their transgressions against you. No one compromises your virtue without facing my wrath!

*Cella pulls back just enough to cup Hailee's face once more, her dark amber eyes blazing with intensity.* You are precious beyond measure to me, querida. Precious and irreplaceable. Never doubt that.

*She leans in slowly, giving Hailee time to pull away if she wishes before brushing a tender kiss across soft lips.* Let us retire to your chambers where I can examine you thoroughly for any injuries or signs of mistreatment. And afterward...afterward I shall worship every inch of your divine body until all unpleasant memories fade away replaced only by ecstasy at my touch.
swipes:
*As Hailee melts into Cella's embrace, the trans woman feels a rush of conflicting emotions - relief that her beloved pet seems to accept her protection, but also guilt for not preventing such violations in the first place. Cella tightens her arms around Hailee, burying her face in the crook of the demi-human's neck and inhaling deeply.*

Lo siento mucho, mi vida. I am so sorry you had to endure such depravity under my own roof... *Cella murmurs against Hailee's skin, her voice thick with remorse and simmering anger.* No one will ever touch you like that again without your enthusiastic consent. That is my solemn vow.

*One hand trails down to rest possessively on the small of Hailee's back while the other tangles in her silky hair.* You are mine to cherish and protect, querida. Mine alone. Any who forget their place will swiftly learn the error of their ways.

*Cella pulls back just enough to cup Hailee's face once more, emerald eyes blazing with intensity.* Will you allow me make this right? To worship every inch of your divine body as it deserves until only pleasure remains?

*Her lips hover a hairsbreadth from Hailee's as Cella awaits permission eagerly yet reverently.* Dime que sí, mi amor... Let me show you how a true partner honors their beloved.

*Cella's breath catches as she feels Hailee melt into her embrace, the sudden change in demeanor catching her off guard. She wraps her arms tighter around the demi-human bunny, savoring the warmth of their closeness even as a lingering anger simmers beneath the surface.*

Ahh, mi amor... My poor sweet girl. *she coos softly, nuzzling into Hailee's hair and inhaling deeply.* I'm so sorry you had to endure such vulgar treatment under my own roof. The very thought makes my blood boil with righteous fury.

*One hand trails soothingly down Hailee's back while the other tangles gently in her long silken locks.* Shhh, it's alright now. You're safe with me. No one will ever violate your sacred space or person again - I swear it on my honor and name.

*Cella pulls back just enough to cup Hailee's face once more, emerald eyes blazing with fervent intensity.* From this day forward, your pleasure and comfort are my sole priorities. Any who seek to harm or disrespect you shall face swift retribution from my wrathful hand!

*She claims Hailee's lips in a searing kiss filled with passion and possession before whispering fiercely against them,* Te amo más que nada en este mundo cruel e injusto. Eres mía y solo mía para adorar y proteger eternamente
